result.html: An gcreideann tú ar DhiaDo you believe in God?
result.ponchtml: An gcreideann tú ar ḊiaDo you believe in God?

result.eng: That's right but they won't believe us.
result.ga: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.orig: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.html: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.
result.ponchtml: Is fíor sin aċ ní ċreidfiḋ siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.

result.eng: If you believe this, you will believe everything.
result.ga: Má chreideann tú é seo creidfidh tú gach rud
result.orig: Má chreideann tú é seo creidfidh tú gach rud
result.html: Má chreideann tú é seo creidfidh tú gach rudIf you believe this, you will believe everything.
result.ponchtml: Má ċreideann tú é seo creidfiḋ tú gaċ rudIf you believe this, you will believe everything.

result.ga: Ná creid gach a gcloiseann tú
result.orig: Ná creid gach a gcloiseann tú
result.html: Ná creid gach a gcloiseann túDon't believe all you hear.
result.ponchtml: Ná creid gaċ a gcloiseann túDon't believe all you hear.

result.html: Ní chreidim thúI don't believe you.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidim ṫúI don't believe you.

result.eng: I don't believe in the other world.
result.ga: Ní chreidim ar an saol eile
result.orig: Ní chreidim ar an saol eile
result.html: Ní chreidim ar an saol eileI don't believe in the other world.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidim ar an saol eileI don't believe in the other world.

result.eng: He didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ga: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteachHe didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċreid sé a ḟusaċt a ḃí sé an ḟaḋb a réiteaċHe didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.

result.eng: We believe it for a reason.
result.html: Tá údar againn lena chreidiúintWe believe it for a reason.
result.ponchtml: Tá údar againn lena ċreidiúintWe believe it for a reason.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
